          <title>
            <string language="hu">Uralkodók élete honlap</string>
            <string language="en">the website illustrating the life of the reigning/ruling class</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Web site, welche die Lebensdauer der

βασιλεψει/απόφασης κλάσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el Web site que ilustra la vida de la clase de 
reigning/ruling</string>

          <description>

            <string language="en">architecture of the reneissance  in the 16th century: Blois, Chambord and the Louvre</string>

          </keyword>

Blois, Chambord und der Luftschlitz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">architecture du reneissance au 16ème siècle :
